document.full_text: shares in oil major bp  fell on tuesday on a report the company's managers could face manslaughter charges following the gulf of mexico oil spill, which could lead to much higher fines over the disaster.
document.title: bp shares hit by manslaughter report, downgrade
lines_and_colors: shares in oil major bp  fell on tuesday on a report the company's managers could face manslaughter charges following the gulf of mexico oil spill, which could lead to much higher fines over the disaster.
